"Hey, <%me>.":
"I've received word of your
efforts in the other regions."

"Even in Stia, I hear you
obtained a grand victory."
"I didn't do anything special."
"That wasn't just me."
"Don't be so modest."
"Anyone would attest to your strength."
"I'm sure it wasn't."

"We also fought alongside
you three, and we were victorious."

"DOLLS can't be defeated
with just individual strength."

"By the way, I heard that Stia contains
many facilities related to the DOLLS."

"Among them, the one known as a power plant
has many similarities to our own Lower Maqaad."

"I hear there were machines
capable of manufacturing DOLLS."
"Hmmm..."

"I had assumed DOLLS were living
creatures capable of naturally reproducing..."
"It would seem I was mistaken."

"Does this mean that someone... invented DOLLS?
Who, when, and why would anyone...?"

"...No, while I do have many doubts,
that kind of research is beyond me, unfortunately."
"I'll leave that to Crawford and his team."

"We, the ARKS of Retem, are
preparing for new battles."

"We've finally recovered from the wounds left by
Lenus Retem, and are currently reorganizing our squads."

"We can't afford to remain on the defensive until
every unknown of this world becomes known."
"I'm setting up our structure for an offensive."

"From now on, we have to start thinking about cooperating
with not just Aelio, but Kvaris and Stia as well."
"Ilma and his family have great teamwork."
"Guren and his team are professionals."

"They are few in number, but they seem
truly dedicated to rebuilding Kvaris."

"Oho, then we can't
let them show us up."

"Lately, everyone's awareness
has started to change."

"Everyone is trying to respect Retem's
traditions that have been passed down..."

"While joining hands with
people who think differently."

"If we're going to be working with others,
we can't afford to be so afraid of change."

"We can't keep rejecting genuinely good
people just because of our own prejudices."

"If we're going to defeat a great enemy, that's
the right choice. I've learned that much personally."

"...I expect there will be an even
greater battle in the future."

"An unavoidable path, for
the sake of a peaceful future."
"Let's continue to work hard together. Let's make it happen."
